content.raw:
Supporting two major versions feels like a bad idea. The issue runs deeper than cmake variables. I "think" we'd have to version all include paths, and version all namespaces. 

This is also highly unusual, which raises red flags.

We've had this very discussion with TRI. @\_jrivero\_  might have some perspective.
content.html:
Supporting two major versions feels like a bad idea. The issue runs deeper than cmake variables. I "think" we'd have to version all include paths, and version all namespaces.

This is also highly unusual, which raises red flags.

We've had this very discussion with TRI. @_jrivero_ might have some perspective.
